articles.author: Thomas Telford
articles.title: Pfizer Covid-19 antiviral pill given green light for use by European Medicines Agency - Dublin Live
articles.description: Plaxovid is being manufactured in two of Pfizer's Irish sites
articles.content:
The EU's drug regulator has given the green light to Pfizer's Covid-19 antiviral pill Paxlovid to be used on adults at risk of serious illness.
Member states can now deploy the drug with a number of… [+1364 chars]

articles.title: ICU patients still display physical, mental and cognitive problems one year after COVID-19 - Hospital Healthcare Europe
articles.description: ICU patients continue to experience physical, mental and cognitive problems one year after their acute infection from COVID-19
articles.content: Intensive care unit (ICU) patients continue to frequently experience physical, mental and cognitive symptoms one year after their acute infection with COVID-19. This was the main finding from a study… [+2811 chars]
